entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:18 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 9.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 8:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 9.1°C

Visibility: 2 km

Wind: S 7 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 early this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
